statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, location FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, location FROM vehicle_locations WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT timestamp, vehicle_id, location FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT vehicle_id, location FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT id, vehicle_id, location, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY location, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations;
SELECT vehicle_id, location_point FROM vehicle_locations WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT status, utilization_percent FROM resource_utilization WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY utilization_percent DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations vl JOIN resource_utilization ru ON vl.vehicle_id = ru.vehicle_id WHERE ru.utilization_percent > 80;
SELECT vehicle_id, location_point FROM vehicle_locations WHERE ST_Distance(location_point, 'POINT(-73.9857 40.7484)') < 1000;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY last_updated DESC, vehicle_id LIMIT 10
SELECT vehicle_id, location_point::text FROM vehicle_locations WHERE ST_Distance(location_point, 'POINT(0 0)') < 1000
SELECT vehicle_id, last_updated FROM vehicle_locations WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated LIMIT 5
SELECT vehicle_id, utilization_percent FROM resource_utilization WHERE status = 'active' AND utilization_percent > 50 ORDER BY utilization_percent DESC

SELECT vehicle_id, location_point FROM vehicle_locations INNER JOIN resource_utilization ON vehicle_locations.vehicle_id = resource_utilization.vehicle_id WHERE resource_utilization.status = 'active' AND ST_Distance(location_point, 'POINT(10 10)') < 2000 ORDER BY vehicle_id
SELECT vehicle_id, license_plate, vehicle_type, last_known_location FROM vehicles;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, driver_license, contact_info FROM drivers;
SELECT trip_id, vehicle_id, driver_id, start_location, end_location, start_time, end_time FROM trips;
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_license FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, license_plate FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT trip_id, start_time, end_time FROM trips WHERE vehicle_id = 1001;
SELECT driver_name, contact_info FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, last_known_location FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT vehicle_name, last_known_location, last_updated FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT driver_name, contact_number FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE last_known_location='New York'
SELECT driver_name, contact_number FROM drivers WHERE driver_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT vehicle_name, last_updated FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type='SUV' AND last_known_location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT assignment_id, start_time, end_time FROM assignments WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE phone_number='123-456-7890';
SELECT route_id, route_name, end_location, start_location FROM routes WHERE end_location='City B';
SELECT driver_name, phone_number FROM drivers WHERE driver_license='ABC123';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_type DESC;
SELECT driver_name, phone_number FROM drivers WHERE driver_license = 'ABC123';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE end_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM vehicles JOIN maintenance_logs ON vehicles.vehicle_id = maintenance_logs.vehicle_id;
